newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: CRICKET-AUSTRALIA BAT AGAINST E.P. XI.
newsitem.headline: CRICKET-AUSTRALIA BAT AGAINST E.P. XI.

text.p: Australia captain Steve Waugh won the toss and elected to bat in the one-day 45 overs match against an Eastern Province Invitation XI on Tuesday.
Australia - Matthew Hayden, Matthew Elliott, Justin Langer, Michael Bevan, Mark Waugh, Greg Blewett, Steve Waugh (captain), Shane Warne, Paul Reiffel, Andy Bichel, Jason Gillespie.

Eastern Province Invitation XI - Gavin Victor, Louis Koen, Ashwell Prince, Dave Callaghan (captain), Clint du Plessis, Justin Kemp, Quentin Ferreira, Shafiek Abrahams, Lulama Mazikazana, Nigel Brouwers, Junaid September.
